# 10.0 Docs

## Windows Forms

- [API obsoletions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/windows-forms/10.0/obsolete-apis.md): Learn about the .NET 10 breaking change where some Windows Forms APIs have been marked as obsolete.
- [Applications referencing both WPF and WinForms must disambiguate MenuItem and ContextMenu types](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/windows-forms/10.0/menuitem-contextmenu.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where applications referencing both WPF and WinForms must disambiguate MenuItem and ContextMenu types.
- [Renamed parameter in HtmlElement.InsertAdjacentElement](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/windows-forms/10.0/insertadjacentelement-orientation.md): Learn about the breaking change in Windows Forms where the parameter `orient` was renamed to `orientation`.
- [TreeView checkbox image truncation](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/windows-forms/10.0/treeview-text-location.md): Learn about the .NET 10 breaking change in Windows Forms where the TreeView checkbox image is truncated under certain conditions.
- [StatusStrip uses System RenderMode by default](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/windows-forms/10.0/statusstrip-renderer.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 for Windows Forms where System.Windows.Forms.StatusStrip uses a different default value for the RenderMode property.
- [System.Drawing OutOfMemoryException changed to ExternalException](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/core/compatibility/windows-forms/10.0/system-drawing-outofmemory-externalexception.md): Learn about the breaking change in .NET 10 where System.Drawing GDI+ OutOfMemory errors now throw ExternalException instead of OutOfMemoryException.
